description:
After escaping from Itadori and Nanami, Mahito reunites with Getou and the others to try and move their plan forward. Meanwhile, Jujutsu Tech is about to host its Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Kugisaki and the second years Maki, Toge, and Panda all meet up to greet Toudou and the other Kyoto students on arrival. Sparks immediately start to fly when Gojou rushes in late to the meetup and presents his surprise--
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event: Group Battle 0
京都姉妹校交流会 -団体戦⓪-
